胡.definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia; reckless; outrageous; what?; why?; to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])

胡亂.definition: careless; reckless; casually; absent-mindedly; at will; at random; any old how

胡人.definition: ethnic groups in the north and west of China in ancient times; foreigner; barbarian

胡佛.definition: Hoover (name); Herbert Hoover (1874-1964) US mining engineer and Republican politician, president (1929-1933)

胡作非為.definition: to run amok (idiom); to commit outrages

胡佳.definition: Hu Jia (1973-), PRC dissident human rights activist

胡來.definition: to act arbitrarily regardless of the rules; to mess with sth; to make a hash of things; to cause trouble

胡兀鷲.definition: (bird species of China) bearded vulture (Gypaetus barbatus)

胡克.definition: Hook or Hooke (name); Robert Hooke (1635-1703), brilliant English experimental scientist and inventor

胡叼盤.definition: derogatory nickname given to Hu Xijin 胡錫進|胡锡进[Hu2 Xi1 jin4] for doing the CCP's bidding as editor of the "Global Times"

胡吃海喝.definition: to eat and drink gluttonously; to pig out

胡圖族.definition: Hutu, an ethnic group in Rwanda and Burundi

胡塗.definition: variant of 糊塗|糊涂[hu2 tu5]

胡塗蟲.definition: blunderer; bungler; also written 糊塗蟲|糊涂虫

胡天胡帝.definition: with all the majesty of an emperor (idiom); reckless; intemperate

胡姬花.definition: Vanda miss joaquim (hybrid orchid), national flower of Singapore

胡弄.definition: to fool; to deceive; to go through the motions

胡志強.definition: Jason Hu (1948-), former Taiwan foreign minister

胡志明.definition: Ho Chi Minh (1890-1969), former Vietnamese leader; see also 胡志明市[Hu2 Zhi4 ming2 Shi4]

胡志明市.definition: Ho Chi Minh City a.k.a. Saigon, Vietnam

胡思亂想.definition: to indulge in flights of fancy (idiom); to let one's imagination run wild

胡想.definition: see 胡思亂想|胡思乱想[hu2 si1 luan4 xiang3]

胡搞.definition: to mess around; to mess with something; to have an affair

胡樂.definition: Hu music; central Asian music (e.g. as appreciated by Tang literati)

胡溫新政.definition: Hu-Wen New Administration (formed in 2003), ostensibly reform-oriented leadership of Hu Jintao 胡錦濤|胡锦涛[Hu2 Jin3 tao1] and Wen Jiabao 溫家寶|温家宝[Wen1 Jia1 bao3]

胡琴.definition: huqin; family of Chinese two-stringed fiddles, with snakeskin covered wooden soundbox and bamboo bow with horsehair bowstring

胡琴兒.definition: erhua variant of 胡琴[hu2 qin2]

胡笙.definition: pipe wind instrument introduced from the non-Han peoples in the North and West

胡紫薇.definition: Hu Ziwei (1970-), PRC lady TV presenter

胡編.definition: to make things up; to concoct (a story, an excuse etc)

胡編亂造.definition: to concoct a cock-and-bull story (idiom); to make things up

胡纏.definition: to pester; to involve sb unreasonably

胡花.definition: to spend recklessly; to squander money

胡言亂語.definition: babbling nonsense (idiom); crazy and unfounded ravings; double Dutch

胡謅.definition: to invent crazy nonsense; to cook up (excuses); to talk at random; wild babble

胡謅亂傍.definition: to talk random nonsense (idiom); to say whatever comes into one's head

胡謅亂扯.definition: to talk nonsense (idiom); saying whatever comes into his head

胡謅亂說.definition: (idiom) to talk random nonsense; to say whatever comes into one's head

胡謅亂道.definition: to talk nonsense (idiom); saying whatever comes into his head

胡謅八扯.definition: to talk random nonsense (idiom); to say whatever comes into one's head

胡適.definition: Hu Shi (1891-1962), original proponent of writing in colloquial Chinese 白話文|白话文[bai2 hua4 wen2]

胡鄂公.definition: Hu Egong (1884-1951), Chinese revolutionary and politician

胡銓.definition: Hu Quan (1102-1180), Song Dynasty official and poet

胡錦濤.definition: Hu Jintao (1942-), General Secretary of the CCP 2002-2012, president of the PRC 2003-2013

胡錫進.definition: Hu Xijin (1960-), editor-in-chief of the "Global Times" 環球時報|环球时报[Huan2 qiu2 Shi2 bao4] 2005-2021

胡雁.definition: Tatar goose, wild goose found in territories northwest of China in ancient times

胡鬧.definition: to act willfully and make a scene; to make trouble
